Description: (description from Register) Pointed cap made of coloured straws, red and yellow patterns on a black ground.
Curator's comments: Register records" "From Desert between Suakim and the frontiers of Egypt". Af1853,0422.8 to 10 are very similar to each other, and must share the same provenance.
Acquisition notes: See comment on the first object in this group, Af1853,0422.1.
